name: Distribution of race and ethnicity among STEM workers, by educational attainment: 2021
description: Distribution of race and ethnicity among STEM workers, by educational attainment: 2021

creator.name: National Center for Science and Engineering Statistics

variableMeasured.name: _b_occupation_group_and_race_or_ethnicity_b
variableMeasured.description: Occupation group and race or ethnicity hierarchy

variableMeasured.name: field_with_a_bachelor_s_degree_or_higher
variableMeasured.description: With A Bachelor S Degree Or Higher

variableMeasured.name: field_less_than_a_bachelor_s_degree_stw_
variableMeasured.description: Less Than A Bachelor S Degree Stw

notes: Data include the employed, civilian, non-institutionalized population ages 16–75 and exclude those currently enrolled in primary or secondary school. Hispanic may be any race. Race categories represent race alone and exclude Hispanic origin.
sources: Census Bureau, American Community Survey (ACS), 1-Year Public-Use File, 2021, data as of 25 October 2022.Science and Engineering Indicators
